html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-02512019-03-25,  ,  ,  PSPC, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Lands Company Limited ** Leases **
PrecisOrder Authorizing (1) the OLD PORT OF MONTREAL CORPORATION INC. to ENTER INTO UP TO 60 LEASES in 2019-20, having individual values of up to 800,000 per year, and a total value of up to $8,000,000, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the 2019-20 to 2023 Corporate plan, and (2) PARC DOWSVIEW PARK INC. to ENTER INTO UP TO 40 LEASES in 2019-20, having individual values of up to 1,500,00 per year, and a total value of up to $10,000,000, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the 2019-20 to 2023-24 Corporate Plan.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Canada Lands Company Limited ** Leases **
precis: Order Authorizing (1) the OLD PORT OF MONTREAL CORPORATION INC. to ENTER INTO UP TO 60 LEASES in 2019-20, having individual values of up to 800,000 per year, and a total value of up to $8,000,000, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the 2019-20 to 2023 Corporate plan, and (2) PARC DOWSVIEW PARK INC. to ENTER INTO UP TO 40 LEASES in 2019-20, having individual values of up to 1,500,00 per year, and a total value of up to $10,000,000, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the 2019-20 to 2023-24 Corporate Plan.
